Description: This legendary film, part of the course of film history, the fruit of cooperation Kalatozov and outstanding Russian operator S.Urusevskogo (The Cranes Are Flying "), is now an interest, of course, not because of its ideology. It is an organic fusion of staged scenes, stylized documentary of life in Cuba late 50's. before the revolution, and beautiful, especially camera work - for him and now are learning to shoot a modern film schools in the world. We see how the casino, bars and hotels and having fun Americans use for their pleasures beautiful but poor Cuban girls, like the farmer who grew the cane for life, announced that its field takes an American corporation, as a young student living in Havana and in her mature freedom sentiment, we see the battle rebels in the mountains, where the weapons supposed to produce in battle; see private stories of ordinary Cubans that make up the history of the country, see how beautiful the island and its inhabitants.
